content:
Here's my attempt to translate the Haiku into Esperanto:

Sonĝo pri paradizo
Inter monotoneco
Timoj kaj fajro atendas

Esperanto is not a natural language but a constructed one, it makes it a little difficult to translate poetry or literature, as the meanings may be hard to convey with the same feeling and emotion. However, I did my best to translate the Haiku into Esperanto, and I hope it still captures the same message and feeling as the original one.
